column5: We are going up with a bunch of kids and would like to stop between nestor falls and Minaki (our destination) to fish from shore, Does anyone have an recommendations along highway 17 going north and/or highway 596? thanks
Perhaps on the hwy 17 north bi-pass you could stop by the bridge over the river.I've been thinking of going for years as I've heard once you can catch goldeye there
Maybe the Rushing River. At the bottom of the falls. Never have stopped there but it looks like a fun spot. It's almost to 71. It feeds into Blindfold Lake.
